name: Nuclear Children
description:
Part of the GMTK 2020 game jam, JukeBox Games has made its submission:

Introducing Nuclear Children! A game where you (a robot) must maintain control over a nuclear powerplant by ensuring all the switches display green, seems easy right? Well today is also a school fieldtrip so children will be with you in the plant, pressing buttons to their hearts content and making your robot life hell. Keep the kids under control or explode!
